title: New MPfree: Orca Orca – Underground
body:
Since [Introducing](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/11358-introducing-orca-orca/) **Orca Orca** back in September last year, **Jim Hewitt** has come a long way in a short space of time, demonstrated perfectly on new track _Underground_. A reworking of a **Young Minds** [demo](http://orca-orca.bandcamp.com/track/underground) from 2010, it benefits from cleaner production making it sound less twee and more ready for live performances. There’s touches of **Mumm-ra**, **The Drums** and **Death Cab For Cutie** on _Underground_, all combining to form two and a half minutes of idyllic, indie-pop; well worthy of a listen. _Underground_ will form part of **Orca Orca’s** next release entitled _**Make Live**_, a limited edition cassette run featuring six new recordings and hand-painted artwork which drops 21 February.

 [Underground](http://soundcloud.com/orcaorca-1/underground) by [orca orca](http://soundcloud.com/orcaorca-1)
